text: Yeh kehtay to hain kay itaâ€™at hai phir jab aap kay pass say uth ker bahir nikaltay hain to inn mein ki aik jamat jo baat aap ney ya uss ney kahi hai uss kay khilaf raaton ko mashwaray kerti hai inn ki raaton ki baat cheet Allah Taalaa likh raha hai to aap inn say mun pher len aur Allah per bharosa rakhen Allah Taalaa kafi kaar saaz hai
